languages.text: "Видимо, и впрям особенные эти исповеди, если Ваша Светлость личное внимание уделяет". {n}Послушник низко вам кланяется.{/n} "Вот уж не думал, что мне сам {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTraderGlossary}Вольный Торговец{/g} придет на помощь".

"I suppose those confessions truly are special if Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} is giving them {mf|his|her} personal attention." {n}The initiate bows deeply.{/n} "Never would I have imagined the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTraderGlossary}Rogue Trader{/g} {mf|him|her}self coming to my aid."
languages.original_text: "Видимо, и впрям особенные эти исповеди, если Ваша Светлость личное внимание уделяет". {n}Послушник низко вам кланяется.{/n} "Вот уж не думал, что мне сам {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTraderGlossary}Вольный Торговец{/g} придет на помощь".

"I suppose those confessions truly are special if Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} is giving them {mf|his|her} personal attention." {n}The initiate bows deeply.{/n} "Never would I have imagined the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTraderGlossary}Rogue Trader{/g} {mf|him|her}self coming to my aid."

languages.text: « Ces confessions doivent être réellement importantes si Votre Seigneurie leur accorde son attention.Je n'aurais jamais cru que {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTraderGlossary}{mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}{/g} en personne viendrait à mon aide, » {n}déclare l'initié en s'inclinant.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I suppose those confessions truly are special if Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} is giving them {mf|his|her} personal attention." {n}The initiate bows deeply.{/n} "Never would I have imagined the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTraderGlossary}Rogue Trader{/g} {mf|him|her}self coming to my aid."

« Ces confessions doivent être réellement importantes si Votre Seigneurie leur accorde son attention.Je n'aurais jamais cru que {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} en personne viendrait à mon aide, » {n}déclare l'initié en s'inclinant.{/n}

languages.text: «Estas confesiones han de ser verdaderamente especiales si mi{mf|lord|lady} está {mf|dispuesto|dispuesta} a dedicarles su atención». {n}El iniciado te dedica una profunda reverencia.{/n} «Jamás habría imaginado que {mf|el mismísimo|la mismísima} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTraderGlossary}Comerciante Independiente{/g} acudiría en mi ayuda».
languages.original_text: "I suppose those confessions truly are special if Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} is giving them {mf|his|her} personal attention." {n}The initiate bows deeply.{/n} "Never would I have imagined the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTraderGlossary}Rogue Trader{/g} {mf|him|her}self coming to my aid."

traits.locale_text: «Estas confesiones han de ser verdaderamente especiales si mi{mf|lord|lady} está {mf|dispuesto|dispuesta} a dedicarles su atención». {n}El iniciado te dedica una profunda reverencia.{/n} «Jamás habría imaginado que {mf|el mismísimo|la mismísima} Comerciante Independiente acudiría en mi ayuda».

languages.text: “既然这几份告解词引起了您的关注，那它们确实非常特别。”{n}助祭对你深鞠一躬。{/n}“我从来没想过，{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTraderGlossary}行商浪人{/g}居然会亲自来帮我的忙。”
languages.original_text: "I suppose those confessions truly are special if Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} is giving them {mf|his|her} personal attention." {n}The initiate bows deeply.{/n} "Never would I have imagined the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTraderGlossary}Rogue Trader{/g} {mf|him|her}self coming to my aid."

traits.locale_text: “既然这几份告解词引起了您的关注，那它们确实非常特别。”{n}助祭对你深鞠一躬。{/n}“我从来没想过，行商浪人居然会亲自来帮我的忙。”

languages.text: 「もしあなたのが注目してくれるのであれば、その告白は本当に特別なものなのでしょう」{n}イニシエイトは深々と頭を下げる。 {/n}「{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTraderGlossary}ローグトレーダー{/g}本人が助けに来てくれるとは想像もしていませんでした」
languages.original_text: "I suppose those confessions truly are special if Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} is giving them {mf|his|her} personal attention." {n}The initiate bows deeply.{/n} "Never would I have imagined the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTraderGlossary}Rogue Trader{/g} {mf|him|her}self coming to my aid."

traits.locale_text: 「もしあなたのが注目してくれるのであれば、その告白は本当に特別なものなのでしょう」{n}イニシエイトは深々と頭を下げる。 {/n}「ローグトレーダー本人が助けに来てくれるとは想像もしていませんでした」

languages.text: "Diese Beichten sind wohl wirklich etwas Besonderes, wenn Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} ihnen persönlich {mf|seine|ihre} Aufmerksamkeit schenkt." {n}Der Eingeweihte verneigt sich tief.{/n} "Ich hätte mir nie träumen lassen, dass {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTraderGlossary}{mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin}{/g} selbst mir zur Hilfe kommt."
languages.original_text: "I suppose those confessions truly are special if Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} is giving them {mf|his|her} personal attention." {n}The initiate bows deeply.{/n} "Never would I have imagined the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTraderGlossary}Rogue Trader{/g} {mf|him|her}self coming to my aid."

traits.locale_text: "Diese Beichten sind wohl wirklich etwas Besonderes, wenn Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} ihnen persönlich {mf|seine|ihre} Aufmerksamkeit schenkt." {n}Der Eingeweihte verneigt sich tief.{/n} "Ich hätte mir nie träumen lassen, dass {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} selbst mir zur Hilfe kommt."

languages.text: "Sanıyorum {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri kendileriyle kişisel olarak ilgileniyorsa bu itiraflar gerçekten de özel olmalı." {n}Zangoç yerlere kadar eğiliyor.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTraderGlossary}Hür Tacir'in{/g} bizzat yardımıma geleceğini asla tahmin edemezdim."
languages.original_text: "I suppose those confessions truly are special if Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} is giving them {mf|his|her} personal attention." {n}The initiate bows deeply.{/n} "Never would I have imagined the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTraderGlossary}Rogue Trader{/g} {mf|him|her}self coming to my aid."
